original_text: Wherefore it shall come to pass, if ye hearken to these judgments, and keep, and do them, that the Lord thy God shall keep unto thee the covenant and the mercy which he sware unto thy fathers:
korean_text: 너희가 이 모든 법도를 듣고 지켜 행하면 네 하나님 여호와께서 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 언약을 지켜 네게 인애를 베푸실 것이라

sentences.original_text: Wherefore it shall come to pass
if ye hearken to these judgments
that the Lord thy God shall keep unto thee
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님이 너를 위해 지키시리라

sentences.original_text: which he sware unto thy fathers:
